# Tenement (Building)
## Overview
**Tenement**

**Create** 41 Goods, 16 Influence, 41 Labor (2,120 gp)

**Rooms** 4 [[Bunks (Room)|Bunks]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]]

A flophouse for housing a large number of people who pay low rent.
